translation.en: I got you, Sensei. Stay with me.
You're a life saver, Casey Jones.
I learned from the best. Come on, we're almost there.
translation.fr: Tu m'as tout appris. On y est presque !

translation.en: Bad doggies!
Impeccable timing, little brother. Very dramatic.
translation.fr: Quel timing, petit frère ! Très théâtral.

translation.en: Help him, Michelangelo. He's hurt bad.
That's it. The resistance failed. The Krang won.
translation.fr:
La résistance a échoué.
Les Krangs triomphent.

translation.en: But… but it isn't over. We've still got a ninja's greatest weapon…
translation.fr:
Mais ce n'est pas fini.
On a l'arme absolue du ninja :

translation.en: hope.
That and a badass mystic warrior.
translation.fr: Et un guerrier mystique hyper balèze.

translation.en: Mikey, we need a time gateway.
It'll take everything I have.
I know, but this is our last chance.
translation.fr: Je sais, mais c'est la seule issue.

translation.en: It's our only chance.
-Wait, what's going on? Where is he going? -Casey, listen.
translation.fr:
- Attends ! Il fait quoi ?
- Casey, écoute.

translation.en: The Krang first came to our planet through a mystic doorway.
translation.fr:
Les Krangs sont arrivés
par une porte magique

translation.en: The key that opened the doorway looked like this.
translation.fr: dont la clé ressemble à ça.

translation.en: Why are you telling me this?
Because Mikey's about to send you back in time to the day that the key was stolen.
translation.fr:
Mikey va te renvoyer
au jour où la clé a été volée.

translation.en: Wait, he's gonna what?
The people who stole that key opened the doorway for the Krang.
translation.fr:
Les voleurs ont ouvert
la porte aux Krangs.

translation.en: You have to find it before that happens.
translation.fr: Tu dois la trouver avant eux.

translation.en: Find the key, stop the Krang.
translation.fr: Trouve la clé. Stoppe les Krangs.

translation.en: -But, Sensei-- -Say it!
"Find the key, stop the Krang."
I don't want to lose you.
Casey, it's not about me.
translation.fr: Casey, ne t'occupe pas de moi.

translation.en: They found us!
Mikey!
Master Michelangelo, no! You're gonna--
Casey…
when you're done saving the world, do me a favor.
translation.fr:
après avoir sauvé le monde,
fais-moi plaisir,

translation.en: Grab a slice!
-[cars honking] -Where…
I made it?
All right, Casey, here we go. Find the key, stop the Krang.
translation.fr:
Au travail, Casey.
Trouve la clé. Stoppe les Krangs.

translation.en: ♪ Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles ♪
Easy does it, Leo.
You've got this.
Concentrate.
The whole world is counting on you…
translation.fr: Le monde entier compte sur toi

translation.en: to break the pizza box stack record!
translation.fr:
pour battre le record
de la pile de pizzas !

translation.en: One-hundred, twenty-five boxes!
They say it couldn't be done, but look who's doing it, moi.
translation.fr:
Qui est en train
d'accomplir l'impossible ?

translation.en: That's Spanish for Leo.
Go ahead, my non-lingual friend, count your unhatched fowl.
translation.fr:
Vas-y, mon ami nullilingue,
vends la peau de l'ours vivant.

translation.en: My record stands until you reach the top,
translation.fr: Atteins le sommet pour battre mon record.

translation.en: which, according to my calculations of wind speed, barometric pressure, and dew point, is highly unlikely. What?
translation.fr:
Improbable, vu la pression atmosphérique
la vitesse du vent et le point de rosée.

translation.en: According to my calculations,
as long as you believe in yourself, you can do anything!
translation.fr: Tout est possible si tu crois en toi !

translation.en: Thanks, little brother. No one believes in himself more than me.
translation.fr:
Merci, petit frère.
Je suis le meilleur à ce jeu-là.

translation.en: Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo!
-Yeah! [chuckles] I am Leo! -Yeah, baby!
translation.fr:
- Ouais ! Je l'ai battu !
- Ouais, bébé !

translation.en: [Raph] There you are.
I've been looking all over for you guys.
Raph, guess who just broke the record?
translation.fr:
- Devine qui détient le record ?
- Toi ?

translation.en: What? You did? How many did you-- [grunts]
translation.fr:
- Devine qui détient le record ?
- Toi ? Combien tu…

translation.en: Stop distracting Raph! We were supposed to be training--
translation.fr: Tu t'égares, Raph ! On devait s'entraîn…

translation.en: Ta-ta-ta-ta-ta. Hold that thought.
Donnie?
Donnie?
You, sir, have bested me. Mazel.
Leo. Leo.
Stop it!
Leo, we have work to do, and you dragged him out here for this?
translation.fr: On a du boulot, et tu les occupes à ça ?

translation.en: Training, record-breaking. The choice was clear.
translation.fr:
S'entraîner ou battre un record,
le choix est vite fait.

translation.en: [Raph sighs] Dang it, Leo. Everything's not about you.
translation.fr: Mince ! Tu n'es pas le centre du monde.

translation.en: When are you gonna grow up and start acting like a hero?
And there it is. Gentlemen…
-What was that? What are you guys doing? -A little game I invented.
translation.fr:
- C'était quoi ?
- Un petit jeu que j'ai inventé.

translation.en: Every time you say "heroes," we take a bite of pizza.
translation.fr:
Dès que tu dis "héros",
on mange une bouchée.

translation.en: I don't say "heroes" that often!
translation.fr: Je ne dis pas si souvent "héros" !

translation.en: Leo!
So what if I say he-- that word a lot. It's a good word. We need to be that word.
translation.fr:
Quel mal y a-t-il à dire "hér…" ce mot ?
C'est beau ! On doit être ce mot.

translation.en: Relax, Raph. We've got this hero thing wired.
translation.fr: Relax, Raph. On a l'ADN des héros,

translation.en: I mean, our ninjocity is off the charts. We've got some kickin' mystic weapons.
translation.fr:
une ninjacité hors norme
et des armes magiques de fou.

translation.en: And do I need to remind you who has four shells and defeated the Shredder?
translation.fr:
Et devine qui a quatre carapaces
et a battu Shredder ?

translation.en: -[Leo] Hey. -[Raph] Leo!
You just don't get it.
-[beeps] -Huh? What is all that-- That's me.
Looks like we have a 317-39.4 in progress!
Oh, come on! Has nobody read Donnie's Big Book of Bad Guy Codes? Nobody?
translation.fr:
Arrêtez ! Personne n'a lu
mon livre de codes d'infractions ?

translation.en: -Nope. -Never gonna happen.
We did it! We got the whatcha-ma-hoosie-doodle!
translation.fr: On a réussi ! On a le bitoniau !

translation.en: Of course we did.
Nothing can stop Supervillain Warren Stone
translation.fr: Rien n'arrête Warren Stone le Maléfique

translation.en: and his conjuring compatriot, Hypno-Potamus!
There they are! Okay, here's the plan--
Raph, relax. Who needs a plan when we got crazy cool mystic powers?
translation.fr:
Ne te casse pas, Raph.
Nos pouvoirs mystiques suffisent.

translation.en: Leo!
Come on, swords, it's portal time!
translation.fr: Katanas chéris ! Portail, je vous prie !

translation.en: I'll see you guys later after I save the day! Buh-buh-bye!
translation.fr: On se voit après la bataille ! Bye !

translation.en: Stop! We need to work together!
Wellington Sunday! It's those pesky Turtles.
translation.fr:
Nom d'un nénuphar !
Encore ces fichues Tortues.

translation.en: License and registration.
Oh, I'm sorry, mate. I must have left it in my other jacket.
translation.fr:
Désolé, vieux.
Ils sont dans mon autre veste.

translation.en: Leo! Ah!
Leo, we're coming.
Don't worry. I got 'em right where I want 'em. [moans]
Doesn't look that way to me. Donnie, Mikey, Maneuver 12.
translation.fr: On ne dirait pas. Donnie, Mikey, manœuvre 12.

translation.en: -On it! -Ha!
Whip-o-rama!
Prepare to be Donnie'd by my mystic tech!
translation.fr: Je vais vous Donatelliser avec ma tech !

translation.en: Oh boy.
Okay, creeps, hand over the stolen thingy!
translation.fr:
Allez, les affreux,
rendez le bidule volé !

translation.en: Oh no.
That's gotta be what they stole!
I got it!
With those clumsy hands? [chuckles] No, I got this one.
translation.fr:
Avec tes grosses pattes ?
Laisse-moi faire.

translation.en: Oh, you portal-chopped him!
"Portal-chopped," I like it. Maybe my new catchphrase?
translation.fr:
"Portaillé" ? Ça me plaît.
Je le ressortirai.

translation.en: Okay, let's see how it fits. "You've been portal chopped!"
translation.fr:
Voyons si ça claque.
"Tu t'es fait portailler !"

translation.en: [Foot Lieutenant] Uh-uh-uh-uh. I'll be taking this.
The Foot Clan?
Finally, after all these centuries, this is ours.
translation.fr:
Après des siècles et des siècles,
elle est enfin à nous !

translation.en: Yes, well, of course, thanks to us, delivered safe and sound.
translation.fr: Et en un morceau grâce à nous, bien sûr.

translation.en: No problemo, partner.
Hey, just quietly, are we partners? We are partners, yeah?
translation.fr: Entre nous, on est bien associés, hein ?

translation.en: Oh man, that thing must be dangerous if the Foot Clan wants it.
translation.fr:
Mince ! Ça doit être dangereux
si le clan des Foot le veut.

translation.en: Ya think?
Huh? What?
[Raph] I clearly said, "I got it." Everybody heard me say, "I got it."
translation.fr:
C'était clair pourtant : "Je l'ai."
Vous m'avez tous entendu !

translation.en: Yeah, but I got it with style.
translation.fr: Oui, mais ma façon était plus élégante.

translation.en: [Raph] But you didn't get it!
You lost it, and now we've got a Foot Clan situation, Leo.
translation.fr:
Tu l'as perdu ! À présent,
on doit se frotter au clan des Foot !

translation.en: What's it gonna take for you to be serious, Leo?
And end up with a worry line between my eyes like you? No, no, no, I do not want a Raph chasm.
translation.fr:
Pour avoir ta ride entre les yeux ?
Un gouffre de Raph ? Non, merci.

translation.en: "Chasm"?
You know, valley, gorge, crevasse.
translation.fr:
Tu sais, une vallée,
une gorge, une crevasse.

translation.en: The only reason I have a chasm is I have to worry about you bozos 24/7.
translation.fr:
Ça, c'est parce que
j'ai trois guignols à surveiller H24.

translation.en: You just don't get it, Leo.
I'm the oldest here.
I'm responsible for keeping us safe and making sure we can handle anything that comes our way.
translation.fr:
Je dois assurer notre sécurité
et nous préparer à tout.

translation.en: 'Cause if I don't, you could all end up dead.
translation.fr: Sinon, vous pourriez tous y rester.

translation.en: Sorry, I missed that.
Can you repeat everything from… well, everything?
translation.fr: Tu peux répéter depuis… ? Le début ?

translation.en: No wonder you always want to train. You really need the practice.
translation.fr:
Voilà pourquoi tu veux t'entraîner.
T'en as besoin.

translation.en: Let him go, Mikey.
Wait! No!
Boys! Stop this arguing!
But, Dad, Leo keeps--
No more.
You are a team. You are brothers.
translation.fr: Vous êtes une équipe. Vous êtes frères.

translation.en: And most importantly, you are too loud!
I cannot hear my TV show!
Tristan finally proposed to Annabelle, but did she say yes?
translation.fr:
Tristan a fait sa demande à Annabelle,
mais a-t-elle dit oui ?

translation.en: I don't know because of you!
translation.fr: À cause de vous, je ne sais pas !

translation.en: Be the ninjas I taught you to be,
respectful and quiet!
Sorry. Excuse me.
Hey, how am I supposed to find this thing?
So many people.
How am I gonna save them all, Sensei?
I really wish you were here. Wait, you are!
translation.fr:
Si seulement tu étais là !
Attends. Mais tu es là !

translation.en: I just need to find you.
April.
She'll know.
Hi, professor. Do you have a sec?
Are you even in this class?
I'm April O'Neil, journalism major.
I write for the Eastlaird University Daily News.
translation.fr:
April O'Neil. J'étudie le journalisme. Je peux prendre des photos
pour un article dans le Fac Actu ?

translation.en: Maybe I could get some shots of you at the whiteboard for a story?
translation.fr:
Je peux prendre des photos
pour un article dans le Fac Actu ?

translation.en: Oh! Of course.
-[farts] -So, uh, what… what should I do?
translation.fr: Dites-moi ce que je dois faire.

translation.en: You know, just write something sciencey.
I actually have the perfect equation for your article.
Now a few where you're staring thoughtfully at your work.
[Professor] Oh, I always stare intently at my equations. Especially this one.
translation.fr:
Je suis toujours absorbé
par mes équations, surtout celle-ci.

translation.en: You know, I think I should put on my lab coat.
translation.fr: Je devrais peut-être mettre ma blouse.

translation.en: -Look at it! -Oh! Okay.
You know, I could probably stare at this equation all day.
translation.fr: Je pourrais passer la journée là-dessus.

translation.en: This is April O'Neil, investigative reporter, Eastlaird University Daily News.
translation.fr:
Ici April O'Neil,
journaliste d'investigation au Fac Actu.

translation.en: For years, this college shot down rumors that a foreign government is paying them millions to develop a super-toxic herbicidal deforestation bomb.
translation.fr:
La fac nie qu'un pays étranger la paie
pour créer une bombe herbicide toxique.

translation.en: Those rumors end today because I'm about to blow the lid off Big Chem.
translation.fr:
Aujourd'hui,
je vais prouver que la rumeur est vraie.

translation.en: April O'Neil.
-Ooh. This stuff looks nasty. -[shutter clicking]
-Hey! Who's there? -[gasps]
Evidence, baby.
Oh boy.
Well, it's a good thing video ain't the only thing I took.
translation.fr: J'ai bien fait de prendre ça aussi.

translation.en: April! Yes!
-Commander O'Neil-- -Catlike reflex!
What's the matter with you, creeping up on a person in the dark?
translation.fr: T'es fou de te glisser dans l'ombre !

translation.en: What the…
And then I saw that picture and I brought him here.
translation.fr: Je l'ai amené à cause de la photo.

translation.en: Sensei?
It's you! It's all of you! Together!
translation.fr: C'est vous ? Vous êtes tous là ?

translation.en: I never thought I'd see you again! I'm so happy I could hug you! [groans]
translation.fr:
Je ne pensais pas vous revoir.
Dans mes bras !

translation.en: Who are you, and why do you have a picture of us?
translation.fr: Qui es-tu ? Pourquoi t'as notre photo ?

translation.en: Yeah, who took this? 'Cause I look great.
translation.fr: Qui l'a prise ? Je suis bien.

translation.en: What's your favorite pizza? 'Cause I'm ordering right now.
translation.fr:
Quelle est ta pizza préférée ?
Je passe commande.

translation.en: And why are you wearing genius-built apparel?
That's trademarked!
Grappling hook!
What's going on?
-[Mikey] He's trying to escape! -[grunts]
-Want me to knock him out again? -Let me.
Donnie? Donnie!
Oh, okay.
Wa… Wait, stop! I'm a friend. Let me explain.
translation.fr: Stop ! Je suis un ami ! Écoutez !

translation.en: Let's start over.
My name is Casey Jones, and the reason I have this photo
translation.fr:
Je m'appelle Casey Jones. C'est vous
qui m'avez donné la photo et la tenue.

translation.en: and your tech is because you gave it to me,
translation.fr:
C'est vous
qui m'avez donné la photo et la tenue.

translation.en: but not yet, because I'm from…
translation.fr: Enfin, pas encore. Parce que je viens…

translation.en: the future!
This isn't a joke.
Please, if time travel is possible, future Donnie would have come back
translation.fr:
Si le voyage dans le temps existait, mon futur moi m'aurait amené
les tirages du loto comme prévu.

translation.en: and already given me all the lottery numbers like we planned.
translation.fr:
mon futur moi m'aurait amené
les tirages du loto comme prévu.

translation.en: It's true. I need you to believe me. Humanity depends on it.
translation.fr:
C'est vrai ! Il faut me croire !
Le futur de l'humanité en dépend.

translation.en: In the future, an alien race decimated the planet.
translation.fr:
C'est vrai ! Il faut me croire !
Le futur de l'humanité en dépend. Des aliens vont détruire la Terre
et nous traquer.

translation.en: We were hunted. We lived in caves. We ate leaves and rats.
translation.fr:
Des aliens vont détruire la Terre
et nous traquer. On vivra dans des grottes,
on mangera des feuilles et du rat.

translation.en: No offense.
None taken. We are delicious. [gulps]
I know how this sounds, but Master Leonardo gave me a mission.
translation.fr:
Ça paraît fou. Mais Maître Leonardo
m'a confié une mission.

translation.en: I do like how he calls me "Master."
Of course I do.
You are the greatest ninja the world has ever seen.
translation.fr: Tu es le plus grand ninja de l'Histoire.

translation.en: You told me to find the key and stop the Krang.
translation.fr:
Tu m'as dit de trouver la clé
et stopper les Krangs.

translation.en: "Aliens." Pfft.
Sure. This story just keeps getting better.
translation.fr: C'est ça ! De mieux en mieux.

translation.en: Splints?
"The Krang"?
I have heard that name.
Powerful, barbaric creatures worshiped by the Foot Clan.
translation.fr:
Le clan des Foot vénère
ces puissantes créatures barbares.

translation.en: Legend says they came from the stars.
Ruthless, unmerciful, with one desire,
translation.fr: Sans pitié, ils n'avaient qu'un seul but :

translation.en: to enslave our world like so many before us.
translation.fr:
nous soumettre,
comme tant d'autres avant nous.

translation.en: All seemed lost,
until great mystic warriors forged a mighty weapon,
translation.fr:
mais des guerriers
forgèrent une arme puissante :

translation.en: a key that was used to lock them in a prison dimension beyond this realm.
translation.fr:
une clé qui les enferma
dans une dimension hors de ce monde.

translation.en: Over the centuries, the mystic key remained hidden
translation.fr: La clé est cachée depuis des siècles,

translation.en: to protect humankind and prevent the return of the Krang.
translation.fr:
pour protéger l'humanité
et empêcher le retour des Krangs.

translation.en: So…
Future boy is really from the future?
Mind… [imitates explosion]
Someone finds the key! Today! They steal it and use it to open a doorway and free the Krang!
translation.fr:
Aujourd'hui, la clé sera volée
et utilisée pour libérer les Krangs !

translation.en: That's why I came back, to find it first.
Master Leonardo drew a picture on the back of that photo.
translation.fr:
Maître Leonardo
l'a dessinée au dos de la photo.

translation.en: So to stop the Krang, all we have to do is find the key before it's stolen.
translation.fr:
Pour stopper les Krangs,
il faut la trouver avant les voleurs.

translation.en: What?
Yeah, did future handsome, amazing me tell you what to do in case that already happened?
translation.fr:
Le fabuleux futur moi
t'a dit quoi faire en cas d'échec ?

translation.en: 'Cause that already happened.
translation.fr: Parce qu'elle a déjà été volée.

translation.en: Oh no, we're too late! [sighs]
No, we're not. 'Cause we know who has the key, the Foot Clan.
translation.fr:
Non. On sait qui a la clé :
le clan des Foot.

translation.en: Okay, we gotta find them before they use it, and this time, we do it together!
translation.fr:
Trouvons-les avant qu'ils l'utilisent.
Et cette fois, on bosse en équipe.

translation.en: Uh, can someone untie me now?
[Hypno-Potamus] Villain to villain, your hideout is a bit… lacking.
translation.fr:
De méchant à méchant,
votre repaire n'est pas très chaleureux.

translation.en: Might I suggest some velvet, a fireplace, maybe a fuzzy white cat with a diamond necklace?
translation.fr:
Essayez le velours, une cheminée,
un chat blanc avec un collier de diamants.

translation.en: Tonight, we liberate our masters from their dimensional prison.
translation.fr:
Ce soir, on libère nos maîtres
de leur prison dimensionnelle.

translation.en: With this key,
we shall free them to lay waste to this world and enslave its people.
translation.fr:
leur permettra de dévaster ce monde
et soumettre son peuple.

translation.en: Ah, I thought we were just gonna rob a bank and be, you know, crime buddies.
translation.fr:
Je croyais qu'on allait voler une banque,
devenir des acolytes.

translation.en: We shall follow the Krang as they lead the Foot Clan to glory!
translation.fr:
On suivra les Krangs
sur le chemin de la gloire !

translation.en: -[Leo] Bored. -[gasps]
You!
-Leo! -What?
I was waiting for a good spot to jump in, but they just kept blabbity-blab-ing.
translation.fr:
J'attendais le bon moment,
mais il n'arrête pas de blablater.

translation.en: There it is! That's the key.
Get them! Don't let them interfere with the ceremony!
translation.fr:
Attrapez-les !
Ne les laissez pas interrompre le rituel !

translation.en: No!
-It started! -[groans]
He's unlocking the doorway! We need to get up there right now!
translation.fr:
Il ouvre la porte !
Il faut l'en empêcher !

translation.en: Casey, go. We've got you covered.
[gasps] Oh no.
Oh no! They're here!
Then let's make sure their visit's short and sweet.
I'm finally free!
The people of this planet will pay for what they've done to me.
translation.fr:
Les gens de cette planète
vont payer pour ce qu'ils m'ont fait.

translation.en: Welcome to Earth. I hope you don't enjoy your stay!
translation.fr:
Bienvenue sur Terre !
Et surtout, bon retour !

translation.en: Enough tricks!
Mikey! Donnie! No!
No…
Raph, what happened to our powers?
They… They're gone.
What did they do to us?
Brother, sister, join me.
Time for us to finish remaking this universe in the image of Krang.
translation.fr:
Terminons de remodeler
cet univers à l'image des Krangs.

translation.en: How I've waited for this day.
Indeed.
Brother, widen the portal and retrieve our ship, the Technodrome.
translation.fr:
Frère, élargis la porte
et ramène notre vaisseau, le Technodrome.

translation.en: Once it is here, this world will kneel before us.
translation.fr:
Grâce à lui,
ce monde s'agenouillera devant nous.

translation.en: Oh, if you two don't mind, I haven't killed anything in ages.
translation.fr:
Si vous permettez,
je n'ai pas tué depuis des lustres.

translation.en: Hot soup!
No!
Retreat!
Retreat? We don't retreat!
Leo, for once, listen to me. They're too powerful and Dad's hurt.
translation.fr:
Pour une fois, écoute-moi.
Ils sont trop forts, et papa est blessé.

translation.en: You don't understand. If we don't close that doorway, it's only gonna get worse.
translation.fr:
Si on ne ferme pas la porte,
ça ne fera qu'empirer.

translation.en: Raph?
I'm not gonna argue with you, Leo! Donnie, escape pods, now!
translation.fr:
- Raph ?
- Ne discute pas, Leo ! Donnie, les capsules !

translation.en: You don't have to tell me twice!
Sensei, we need to get that key!
-[Leo grunts] -Leo!
Raph?
Raph, wait, no.
Wait, Raph! Raph! No, Raph! Raph! No, Raph!
[computer] Escape pods incoming.
[computer] Congratulations on surviving, fam.
-Huh? -[grunting]
[Donnie] Oh, I hate that.
Everyone okay? Anybody hurt?
How did we get here? Donnie pods. We've never had to use those before.
translation.fr:
- Comment on est revenus ?
- En capsule. C'est une première.

translation.en: So, how would everyone rate their escape experience?
"Very satisfied," "Very, very satisfied," "Extremely satisfied"?
-Donnie! -Sorry. Sorry. Data collection calms me down.
translation.fr:
- Donnie !
- Pardon. Traiter des données m'apaise.

translation.en: Splints.
This is terrible! Why did we leave?
In case you didn't notice, we were getting our butts kicked!
translation.fr: T'as pas remarqué ? On a pris une raclée !

translation.en: -[strains] -But my mission was to stop them!
Now, the Krang are using that key to bring in something that will destroy the world.
translation.fr:
Grâce à la clé, les Krangs déploient
ce qui détruira le monde.

translation.en: We lost.
-Where's my other pod? -Where's Raph?
translation.fr:
- Où est ma capsule ?
- Et Raph ?

translation.en: Ah, did you know this would happen? Why didn't you tell me?
translation.fr: Tu savais que ça finirait mal !

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Easy!
translation.fr:
- Comment ça ?
- Du calme, Leo ! Où est Raph ?

translation.en: -Leo, what's going on? Where's Raph? -Leo, what happened to Raph?
translation.fr:
- Comment ça ?
- Du calme, Leo ! Où est Raph ? - Qu'est-il arrivé à Raph ?
- Leonardo ?

translation.en: [Splinter] Leonardo?
They… They got him.
You left Raph? He left himself.
He used his pod to save me, all because I went after this stupid thing.
translation.fr:
Il m'a donné sa capsule.
Tout ça pour ce truc de malheur.

translation.en: You got it! Nice.
"Nice"? They captured Raph!
He's from the future! He knew this would happen! No, I didn't. This didn't happen in my time.
translation.fr:
- Il vient du futur. Il savait !
- Non. Ça ne me dit rien.

translation.en: We changed the past, and you got the key.
translation.fr:
On a changé le passé.
Tu as récupéré la clé.

translation.en: That means there's still a chance to stop them.
-No, we have to save Raph. Come on. -Leo, wait.
translation.fr:
- Non, on sauve Raph. Venez.
- Attends !

translation.en: If you won't come, I'll go myself.
-We've lost our mystic powers. -We don't have a plan!
translation.fr:
- On a perdu nos pouvoirs.
- On n'a pas de plan !

translation.en: We don't need a plan. "I'm the greatest ninja the world's ever seen," his words.
translation.fr:
Inutile. Je suis "le plus grand ninja
de l'Histoire", selon lui.

translation.en: Shouldn't we talk about this before we run off all half-cocked, willy-nilly, pell-mell?
translation.fr:
On peut en parler
avant de foncer tête baissée ?

translation.en: I keep being told I'm doing this hero thing wrong. But I got the key, didn't I?
translation.fr:
On me dit que je ne suis pas un héros.
Mais j'ai eu la clé, non ?

translation.en: I get results, so now we're doing it my way.
translation.fr:
Le résultat est là.
Alors, on le fait à ma façon.

translation.en: My son, listen to your team. This is not about you.
translation.fr:
Mon fils, écoute ton équipe.
Tu n'es pas le seul responsable.

translation.en: They made it about me when they took my brother.
translation.fr: Si. J'ai laissé mon frère là-bas.

translation.en: Trust me, I got this.
Donnie, you're driving.
What do we do with this?
We can't just bring it with us, but we can't just leave it behind.
translation.fr:
On ne peut
ni l'emporter ni la laisser ici.

translation.en: Then we should destroy it.
Splints and I will stay here and take care of business.
Thanks, Commander O'Neil.
"Commander"? I like the sound of that.
Oh, look at it.
-[groans] -Disgusting.
-[grunts] -Try looking in a mirror.
Ugh, it's talking at me.
I'm going to rip out its tongue.
translation.fr: Je vais lui couper la langue.

translation.en: [Krang 1] Forgive my sister.
She's got a bit of a temper.
And being in prison for a thousand years hasn't done her any favors.
translation.fr:
Et mille ans en prison
ne l'ont pas arrangée.

translation.en: You're not human.
What are you? Let me go, and I'll show you.
translation.fr:
- Tu es quoi ?
- Détache-moi. Tu verras.

translation.en: You're more powerful than the people of this planet, yet you defend them.
translation.fr:
Tu es plus fort que les gens
de cette planète, mais tu les défends.

translation.en: -Why? -It's my duty.
A word used by the weak.
Many planets before yours have spoken of duty.
translation.fr:
Les autres planètes
parlaient aussi de devoir.

translation.en: They too have been consumed by the Krang.
translation.fr: Elles ont été ravagées par les Krangs.

translation.en: And now our glorious crusade continues
translation.fr: Et à présent, nous repartons en croisade

translation.en: to restore the natural order of things.
translation.fr: pour rétablir l'ordre naturel des choses.

translation.en: The strong will devour the weak.
Last I checked, we weren't the ones locked in a prison dimension for a thousand years.
translation.fr:
Enfin, nous,
on n'a pas passé mille ans en prison.

translation.en: That's called "trash talk." A rare misstep.
Once I retrieve the key from your comrades, I will bring forth the mighty Technodrome,
translation.fr:
Après avoir repris la clé à tes amis,
je ferai venir le grand Technodrome.

translation.en: and you will witness the true power of the Krang.
translation.fr:
Et tu découvriras
le vrai pouvoir des Krangs.

translation.en: Now, where have they taken my key?
translation.fr: Alors, où sont-ils partis avec ma clé ?

translation.en: It won't tell you anything.
Let me kill it.
Lady brain face here is right. I'm not telling you jack.
translation.fr:
Tête de cervelle a raison.
Je dirai que dalle.

translation.en: You don't have to tell me.
I'll look myself.
There it is.
They always do it the hard way.
Our brother and I will secure a location for the dimensional doorway.
translation.fr:
On va préparer le terrain
pour la porte dimensionnelle.

translation.en: Take these soldiers and retrieve me my key.
translation.fr: Emmène ces soldats retrouver ma clé.

translation.en: We live to serve.
You will serve me whether you live or not.
translation.fr: Vous me servirez vivants ou morts.

translation.en: [Casey Jones] What is this thing?
[Donnie laughs] Hold on to your gluteus maximi!
The Turtle Tank, baby! It's how we roll in the past.
translation.fr:
Le Tortue-tank, bébé !
Notre véhicule du passé.

translation.en: I mean, the present. I mean…
-Ugh! Time travel's confusing. -They're on the move.
According to the subcutaneous tracker I put on Raph-- Wait, does that mean you put trackers on all of us?
translation.fr:
- La puce implantée dans Raph…
- Attends, tu nous as implanté une puce ?

translation.en: "No"?
No, of course I did… n't.
translation.fr: Non ! Bien sûr que si. Mais non.

translation.en: Based on their trajectory, they're headed… …to the tallest building in the city.
translation.fr:
- Leur trajectoire tend vers…
- La plus haute tour.

translation.en: That's right, Metro Tower.
I heard the story so many times as a kid, but I never thought…
translation.fr:
J'ai entendu l'histoire
étant enfant, mais…

translation.en: "And behold,
from their perch atop New York City, the Krang ripped open the sky itself."
translation.fr:
"du sommet de New York,
les Krangs ont déchiré le ciel,

translation.en: "What came out was terror, and what rained down upon us was worse than death."
translation.fr:
"répandant la terreur
en une pluie plus redoutable que la mort."

translation.en: They told that to kids?
Man, the future is harsh.
I'm not gonna let that happen.
We need to get into Metro Tower without being spotted. We'll take the subway tunnels.
translation.fr:
On va se glisser dans la tour
par le tunnel du métro.

translation.en: Subway tunnels don't offer much in the way of an escape if we need it.
translation.fr: C'est un coup à rester piégés.

translation.en: -Are you sure about this? -Yeah, maybe we should--
translation.fr:
Tu es sûr ? - Oui, on devrait…
- Les gars, on le fait à ma façon.

translation.en: Guys, we're doing it my way. Remember?
translation.fr:
- Oui, on devrait…
- Les gars, on le fait à ma façon.

translation.en: Prepare the site so we may bring forth the Technodrome.
translation.fr:
Préparez le site
pour la venue du Technodrome.

translation.en: Yes, brother.
See? Smooth sailing. We'll have Raph in no time.
translation.fr: Vous voyez ? À l'aise. Ce sera vite plié.

translation.en: I hope he's okay. How are we gonna find him once we get there?
translation.fr:
J'espère qu'il va bien.
Comment on va le trouver ?

translation.en: I have a lot of questions regarding "once we get there."
translation.fr: J'aurai des questions une fois là-bas.

translation.en: Relax. We'll do what we always do. Ninja in, ninja their faces, ninja out.
translation.fr:
Relax. On ne change rien.
Ninjentre, ninjattaque, ninjesors.

translation.en: That's exactly how you freed all those families from the Krang labor camp.
translation.fr:
Comme quand t'as libéré
les forçats du camp krang.

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds like me.
In the future, you guys are beyond amazing.
translation.fr: Dans le futur, vous êtes monstrueux.

translation.en: The mystic powers you're able to harness are on a whole other level.
Of course! What about my future? I'm expecting big things for me.
translation.fr:
Mais oui ! Dis-moi tout.
J'ai de grandes ambitions.

translation.en: How many Nobel prizes do I have? Don't tell me. I wanna be surprised.
translation.fr:
Combien de Nobel ?
Ne dis rien. Ce sera la surprise.

translation.en: Donnie, you were the most brilliant, innovative mind of all time.
translation.fr:
Donnie, tu es l'inventeur
le plus brillant de tous les temps.

translation.en: I'm shocked, I am. Go on, continue to meet my expectations.
translation.fr:
Quel choc ! Continue.
Tu confirmes mes prévisions.

translation.en: What do I do in the future?
You are the most powerful mystic warrior the world has ever known.
translation.fr:
Tu es le guerrier mystique
le plus puissant au monde.

translation.en: With those two hands, you sent me back in time.
translation.fr: Tes mains me font remonter le temps.

translation.en: Actually, there is something I should tell you.
translation.fr: Il faut que je vous dise quelque chose.

translation.en: [Turtle Tank] Auto brake engaged.
Think we're in the right place?
Looks like the Metro Tower station is on the other side of those vines.
translation.fr:
Ces lianes bloquent l'accès
à la station Metro Tower.

translation.en: Great. Let's hoof it.
Through the disgusting, drippy slime jungle?
I know. I know. Leo knows best, but I'm not sharing my hand sanitizer.
translation.fr:
OK. On fait à ta façon.
Mais je prête pas mes lingettes.

translation.en: [Leo] Feeling a lack of rush in this rush hour, right?
translation.fr: C'est calme pour l'heure de pointe, non ?

translation.en: [Donnie] I don't know, Leo. Something feels…
translation.fr: Je ne le sens pas, Leo. Ça me semble…

translation.en: off.
Don't worry. I won't let us die. I'm a mystic warrior.
translation.fr:
Ne crains rien.
Le guerrier mystique est là.

translation.en: "I feel better already," he said without a hint of sarcasm.
translation.fr:
"Tu me rassures",
dit-il sans sarcasme aucun.

translation.en: Look, the stairs.
translation.fr:
L'escalier !
On a bien fait de passer par le tunnel.

translation.en: Sneaking in from below was the right move. Those slimeballs will never see us coming.
translation.fr:
L'escalier !
On a bien fait de passer par le tunnel. Ces tas gluants n'auront rien vu venir.

translation.en: [April] We tried to jackhammer it, flamethrower it, pour acid on it…
translation.fr:
On a tenté marteau-piqueur,
lance-flammes, acide…

translation.en: I thought lasers cut everything! How did that not work?
translation.fr: Je croyais qu'un laser, ça coupait tout !

translation.en: There's not even a scratch!
Maybe it was your aim. Maybe your big rat head got in the way!
translation.fr:
- Tu as peut-être mal visé.
- Ta grosse tête de rat m'a bouché la vue.

translation.en: Mmm, I'll show you, fat rat head.
Okay, deep breaths.
You said some things, I said some things.
translation.fr: On regrette ce qu'on a dit.

translation.en: Maybe we should just get back to saving the world.
What's next?
This cannot be good.
April O'Neil!
[Krang 2] Come back here!
-[tires screeching] -[Splinter] Faster.
Faster!
I knew this was a bad idea.
Leo, there's too many. We should go back.
translation.fr: Leo, il y en a trop ! Partons !

translation.en: No, we're gonna get to those stairs.
Leo, we're not gonna make it! We have to turn back.
We push forward, get Raph, that's final.
translation.fr:
On avance et on va chercher Raph,
point final.

translation.en: Mystic hands!
translation.fr: Par le pouvoir des mains mystiques !

translation.en: Donnie! Mikey!
Oh no, Donnie, your soft shell! You're exposed!
translation.fr:
Oh, non ! Donnie, tu as perdu
ta carapace de combat !

translation.en: We gotta find shelter!
Oh, oh, keep it down, Vomitello!
Oh. Keep it down, daddy!
Run, insects, but you can't escape!
translation.fr:
Fuyez, vermisseaux !
Vous ne m'échapperez pas !

translation.en: [sighs] Don't!
The key, human! Give it to me!
What did you do to me? What did you do to my face?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que c'est ? Qu'as-tu fait à mon visage ?

translation.en: I knew that stuff was nasty! I told y'all!
translation.fr: Je savais que c'était une saleté !

translation.en: Yes, yes, you're a genius. Let's go.
[April] Donnie, come in. They found us. Where should we go? Donnie?
translation.fr:
Donnie, réponds !
Ils nous ont trouvés. On va où ?

translation.en: [Donnie] We're trapped.
We are trapped in the subway under Metro Tower.
translation.fr: Dans le métro, sous la tour.

translation.en: The tank is running on emergency power and is covered in some kind of Krang bio-growth.
translation.fr:
Le tank est couvert de liane krang
et sur batterie de secours.

translation.en: -I repeat-- -April, come quick!
We're getting squished!
We're on our way!
But, April, how will we get them out?
translation.fr: Comment on va les tirer de là ?

translation.en: I've got an idea.
Yeesh. Remind me to never get on your bad side.
Casey! [moans]
Casey, you okay?
Donnie, Mikey, anybody?
What the heck was that?
Some kind of drippy, crazy Krang monster.
translation.fr: Une sorte de monstre krang visqueux.

translation.en: No, I mean you! Why weren't you listening to anybody? Because I was trying to get us into the building!
translation.fr:
- Je parle de toi ! Tu n'écoutes pas !
- Je voulais atteindre la tour !

translation.en: That sure worked out well. I was doing everything right. How could it go wrong?
translation.fr:
- C'est réussi !
- J'ai pourtant tout fait comme il faut.

translation.en: Because you weren't listening to your team!
You don't have all the answers all the time!
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas réponse à tout !

translation.en: I'm the greatest ninja the world's ever seen. You said that.
translation.fr:
Tu m'as appelé
"le plus grand ninja de l'Histoire".

translation.en: [sighs] I was wrong.
What?
You're impulsive, you're arrogant,
translation.fr:
Tu es impulsif, arrogant
et tu ne vois pas que tes décisions

translation.en: and you don't see that every decision you make could cost someone their life.
translation.fr:
Tu es impulsif, arrogant
et tu ne vois pas que tes décisions mettent des vies en danger.

translation.en: You want to know what really happens to your brothers in the future?
translation.fr: Tu sais ce qui arrivera à tes frères ?

translation.en: They die. Everybody dies fighting the Krang.
translation.fr:
Ils mourront tous
en combattant les Krangs.

translation.en: The world needs Master Leonardo. And all we got is this guy.
translation.fr:
Le monde a besoin de Maître Leonardo.
Et voilà ce qu'on a.

translation.en: We have an update on the strange situation at Metro Tower.
translation.fr:
On a du nouveau
sur la situation à la Metro Tower.

translation.en: All contact has been lost with those inside the building,
translation.fr: Plus personne ne répond dans la tour.

translation.en: and conflicting reports suggest something is barricading entrance for emergency personnel.
translation.fr:
Des témoignages suggèrent
qu'un obstacle bloque l'accès aux secours.

translation.en: Fools.
These creatures should welcome the power of the Krang.
translation.fr:
Ces créatures devraient saluer
le pouvoir des Krangs.

translation.en: You on the rooftop! Stop and surrender immediately!
[reporter] We've got eyes on the roof top where the police are confronting--
translation.fr:
Voici une vue du toit
où la police interpelle…

translation.en: What is that?
You may begin. [roars]
[man] Look out!
-[strains] -[Leo] Look, I know I'm not the Leo you knew in the future, and maybe I never will be.
translation.fr:
Écoute, je ne serai peut-être jamais
le Leo que tu as connu.

translation.en: This whole time I was sure my family needed me, but the truth is I need them.
translation.fr:
Je croyais que ma famille
dépendait de moi, mais c'est l'inverse.

translation.en: If we're gonna survive this, we have to do it together.
translation.fr: Pour s'en sortir, on doit unir nos forces.

translation.en: [Turtle Tank] Hull integrity, 4%. Breach imminent. Good luck.
translation.fr:
Intégrité de la carrosserie : 4 %.
Rupture imminente. Bonne chance.

translation.en: Whew, good. We have an imminent amount of time.
translation.fr: Ouf. On a encore plein de temps.

translation.en: "Imminent" means "soon," Mikey.
Don't worry. I'll save us with my mystic hands.
translation.fr:
Ne crains rien.
Mes mains mystiques nous sauveront.

translation.en: Casey must have been wrong about me.
translation.fr: Casey a dû se tromper sur moi.

translation.en: This is it, Donnie.
We're gonna get crushed!
-[April] Knock-knock! -April?
Anyone order a rescue?
Boom goes the herbicide!
April!
You saved us!
Uncomfortable with emotion!
Where is Leo? And, uh, Future Boy?
translation.fr: Où sont Leo et le gars du futur ?

translation.en: Somewhere in there.
[Krang 2] Faster! They're this way.
I can smell them. [laughs]
-[screaming] -She found us! We gotta move now.
Oh man, is this what the future looks like?
translation.fr: Mince ! C'est comme ça dans le futur ?

translation.en: Nope, the future is worse. Much worse.
Donnie, Mikey, do you read me?
[Donnie] Come in, Leo.
Donnie, where are you?
We've extracted from the subway and are ascending a staircase.
translation.fr: On s'est extraits du tunnel. On sort.

translation.en: I'm getting a lot of interference, but if you hold still,
translation.fr: Je te reçois mal. Bouge pas.

translation.en: I can triangulate your position using a complex geo-location algorithm.
translation.fr:
Mon algorithme de géolocalisation
triangule ta position.

translation.en: -[Casey Jones] Uh, Donnie? -Odd numbers, primes, no… almost.
translation.fr: Donnie ? Nombres impairs, premiers. Ça vient !

translation.en: -Almost! -[Splinter clears throat]
Ugh. I never get to use my algorithm.
Man, I am so glad you guys aren't dead.
translation.fr: Je suis content que vous n'ayez rien !

translation.en: Ditto.
Okay, before this gets too mushy, we need to locate Raph.
translation.fr:
Trêve de niaiseries.
On doit localiser Raph.

translation.en: Can you tell me if he's in the building? Bet your momma's subatomic particles I can.
translation.fr:
- Donnie, t'es cap ?
- Tu insultes mes neurotransmetteurs.

translation.en: Got him! He's close.
translation.fr: Ça y est ! Il est tout près.

translation.en: He's almost on top of us.
Wait, he is on top of us.
[all] Raph!
Quick, cut him down, get him out of there.
Hang on. We got you. Almost there.
translation.fr: Tiens bon. On est là. Voilà.

translation.en: Raph?
Surprise.
What did you do to my brother?
Improved him.
Thank you for this. We will be putting it to good use.
translation.fr: Merci. On en fera bon usage.

translation.en: Come, the world awaits destruction.
translation.fr: Venez, on a un monde à anéantir.

translation.en: Tear them apart!
We gotta move.
-Leo, move! [grunts] -No!
A shame our brethren didn't survive the prison dimension.
translation.fr:
Dommage que nos frères
aient péri en prison.

translation.en: Then again, their weakness has no place in my new Krang empire.
translation.fr:
Mais il n'y a pas de place
pour les faibles dans mon nouvel empire krang.

translation.en: Open and bring unto this world
translation.fr: Ouvre la porte et déchaîne sur ce monde

translation.en: the mighty power of Krang!
[radio] Warning! This is a warning! …appears to be something falling from the sky--
translation.fr:
Alerte ! Quelque chose
semble tomber du ciel.

translation.en: Begin!
[Mikey] What do we do now?
I fear we are lost. The Krang are too powerful.
translation.fr:
Je crains qu'on soit fichus.
Les Krangs sont trop puissants.

translation.en: Maybe we could change the future some other way.
Guys, it's time to face facts. We can't change the future.
translation.fr:
Les gars, soyons réalistes.
On ne peut pas changer l'avenir.

translation.en: Says who?
Says the grandfather paradox, says physical determinism,
translation.fr:
Le paradoxe du grand-père,
le déterminisme,

translation.en: says the space-time continuum. Look, I didn't want it to be true, but…
translation.fr:
le continuum espace-temps.
J'espérais que ce soit faux, mais…

translation.en: [sighs] …science.
That's it! Donnie's wrong.
The world is ending, yet the barbs continue.
translation.fr: C'est la fin du monde, mais moque-toi !

translation.en: Don't you remember? We already did change the future.
translation.fr: Tu as oublié ? On a déjà changé l'avenir.

translation.en: Raph never got kidnapped and turned into a Krang zombie in your time.
translation.fr:
Le Raph du futur
a-t-il été un zombie krang, Casey ?

translation.en: -Right, Casey? -No, he didn't.
translation.fr:
Le Raph du futur
a-t-il été un zombie krang, Casey ? Non.

translation.en: That means we did change the future! We're just in a different… [stammers]
translation.fr:
Donc on a changé l'avenir.
On est dans une autre…

translation.en: Bifurcated time branch?
Yes, yes, yes, that nerd thing.
You know what that means, right? We still have hope!
translation.fr: Ça signifie qu'il y a encore de l'espoir !

translation.en: A ninja's greatest weapon.
Hey, I like that!
[sighs] Look, I'm done thinking I have all the answers. I don't know how to beat the Krang,
translation.fr:
Je n'ai pas réponse à tout.
J'ignore comment battre les Krangs.

translation.en: but I do know our future isn't written until we write it as a team.
translation.fr:
Mais je sais que c'est à nous
d'écrire l'avenir ensemble.

translation.en: So what do we got?
Maybe…
Maybe we don't have to beat them. Can't we just send them back to the prison dimension?
translation.fr:
qu'au lieu de les battre,
on pourrait les renvoyer en prison !

translation.en: There's an idea! Donnie, what do those big, beautiful eyebrows have to say?
translation.fr:
Bonne idée !
Donnie, que disent ces beaux sourcils ?

translation.en: If we got control of their ship, we could send it back through the portal.
translation.fr:
On prend le contrôle du vaisseau
et on le renvoie là-bas.

translation.en: Yes! Yes! Now we're cooking. Who else?
If someone on the ground can get to that key…
translation.fr: L'un de nous s'empare de la clé.

translation.en: We can close the doorway.
And then bye-bye Krang forever, baby!
translation.fr: Adieu les Krangs ! Et bon débarras !

translation.en: Exactly. What do you say, Donnie? You ready to fly a space ship?
translation.fr:
Exactement. Alors, Donnie ?
Prêt à piloter le vaisseau ?

translation.en: Literally the greatest question I have ever been asked.
translation.fr: Là, tu me prends par les sentiments.

translation.en: All right, team, we have a plan. Let's go save the world.
translation.fr:
Beau travail d'équipe !
Allons sauver le monde.

translation.en: Wait, but what about Raph?
That big jerk may be covered in goo and half alien,
but he's still our brother, and I'm not giving up on him. I'm not leaving him behind.
translation.fr:
C'est toujours notre frère.
Je ne l'abandonnerai pas.

translation.en: There's the key. Let's go.
Like Casey said, let's go!
[Donnie] I wish my tech was working! Usually, my cardio is jetpack-assisted.
translation.fr:
Ma tech m'a lâché !
Mon cardio regrette le jetpack !

translation.en: I'm not getting credit for any of these steps!
translation.fr: Et mon nombre de pas sera faussé.

translation.en: Hey, question, is it too late to join April's team?
You two figure out how to hijack this ship. I'm gonna find Raph.
translation.fr:
Vous, détournez le vaisseau.
Moi, je ramène Raph.

translation.en: So how do we hack this thing?
[Donnie] Best guess, main console?
Unfortunately, it's ocupado.
translation.fr: Mais il y a déjà quelqu'un.

translation.en: [Mikey] Uh, new plan.
Run!
Surprise. I've come for my brother.
translation.fr: Surprise ! Je viens pour mon frère.

translation.en: Let me guess.
Duty.
[chuckles] He said doodie.
I see you got yourself an upgrade.
translation.fr: On ne sort plus sans son casque ?

translation.en: You'll pay for what you have done to me!
translation.fr: Tu vas me le payer cher !

translation.en: This psycho routine is a little thin. Where's the character development?
translation.fr:
Encore ce numéro de psychopathe !
Aucune profondeur !

translation.en: [Casey Jones] Leo's counting on us to get to that key.
translation.fr: Leo compte sur nous pour la clé !

translation.en: I think I have an idea.
Cover me!
Raph, you're coming with me, whether you like it or not.
translation.fr: Raph, je ne pars pas sans toi.

translation.en: I don't want to fight you, but I will if I have to.
translation.fr: Ne m'oblige pas à me battre.

translation.en: Oh, you will have to.
Bravo, Mikey!
There's no buttons, or computers, or anything.
Just a lot of drippy, ooey-gooey disgustingness.
translation.fr: Juste un gros tas de slime dégoûtant.

translation.en: I don't know how to hack in…
Oh God, I know what I have to do.
What?
No, I don't think I can do this. -What are you talking about? -[gulps]
translation.fr:
- Je n'y arriverai pas.
- À faire quoi ?

translation.en: Oh no!
That's… [wretches] …so gross!
-I can't do it. -I believe in you!
-No, it's my worst nightmare. -I know.
I'm doing it! I'm doing it!
Raph, I know you're in there somewhere. You've gotta snap out of this!
translation.fr:
Raph, je sais que tu es là.
Reprends le dessus !

translation.en: Do you feel what the power of the Krang can do?
translation.fr: Tu vois l'ampleur de notre pouvoir ?

translation.en: I am saving this weak planet!
translation.fr: Je vais sauver cette pauvre planète !

translation.en: I am a gift!
translation.fr: C'est un cadeau que je vous fais !

translation.en: It's not working. I need more of a connection. Mikey, take off my battle shell.
translation.fr:
Non. La connexion est insuffisante.
Détache ma carapace de combat.

translation.en: No, you're too vulnerable with just your soft shell.
translation.fr: Non. Tu seras vulnérable sans elle.

translation.en: There's no time, hurry.
Donnie? [yelps]
Mikey, I am…
a spaceship!
I'm trying to save you, you idiot! Why do you have to make things so hard?
translation.fr:
Je te sauve, idiot !
Et toi, tu me compliques la vie !

translation.en: You want to keep coming at me? Go ahead. I'm done fighting you.
translation.fr:
Tu sais quoi ?
J'arrête de me battre contre toi.

translation.en: What?
No!
Finally, man and machine
entwixed in perfect bionic synergy!
How dare you desecrate Krang's ship!
translation.fr:
Comment osez-vous
profaner le vaisseau krang ?

translation.en: Donnie, Mikey!
I don't want to fight anymore.
I was fighting you because I didn't understand you, but now I get it.
translation.fr:
Parce que j'ai enfin compris
ce que tu ressens.

translation.en: I always figured you were mad because you didn't like the way I did things.
translation.fr: Je croyais que c'était moi qui t'énervais.

translation.en: But when I see what's happening to you, and what's happening to them…
translation.fr: Mais en vous voyant dans cet état,

translation.en: I realized it wasn't about me.
You didn't yell because you were mad, you yelled because you were scared.
translation.fr:
T'étais pas en colère contre moi.
T'avais peur.

translation.en: It's scary to be responsible for the lives you protect.
translation.fr:
C'est flippant
d'avoir des vies à protéger.

translation.en: Your team… your family,
but we do it anyway because that's what it means to be a hero.
translation.fr:
Et on le fait malgré tout.
C'est ça, un héros.

translation.en: If this is it, I want you to know I finally understand.
translation.fr:
Si c'est la fin,
sache que je t'ai compris.

translation.en: And I'm sorry.
Raph, Raph, there you are! Come back! Your family needs you.
translation.fr:
Raph, c'est toi ?
Reviens ! On a besoin de toi.

translation.en: -Leo? -Yes!
Mikey, Donnie, we can fight this. Raph's doing it for us, so we do it for him.
translation.fr:
Les gars, résistez !
Raph le fait pour nous. Et nous, pour lui.

translation.en: That alien jerkface thinks we're weak
because he hasn't seen what we can do…
translation.fr: Il n'a pas vu ce qu'on vaut

translation.en: when we fight together!
translation.fr: quand on se bat tous ensemble !

translation.en: It's pointless to resist Krang. Give up!
translation.fr: Il est inutile de résister aux Krangs.

translation.en: You will be consumed like everyone else on this pathetic planet!
translation.fr:
Vous serez anéantis comme tout le reste
de cette planète minable !

translation.en: -[yells] -Fat chance.
We're not like everyone else on this planet.
translation.fr: On n'est pas comme les autres.

translation.en: We are…
…the Teenage…
-…Mutant… -…Ninja…
…Turtles!
If this isn't the poster shot, someone's getting fired.
translation.fr: Ça fera une super affiche de film.

translation.en: -[thuds] -Oh, we are not done yet.
April O'Neil!
That's payback.
Keep her under that building until I bring it down.
translation.fr: Occupez-la pendant que je casse tout !

translation.en: Casey, get out of there!
Commander O'Neil!
Nice shot.
Donnie's almost got the ship to the other side. I have to get to the key.
translation.fr:
Le vaisseau passe la porte.
Je dois retirer la clé.

translation.en: See ya.
Come in, Sensei, it's Casey. Can you hear me?
Come in, Sensei! Can you hear me?
Okay! Donnie!
Cowabunga!
[Mikey] Flip-o-rama!
Let's roll.
Ka-zoom!
Raph, go.
On it!
Gotcha! Don't worry, Donnie! This is not a hug. It's a rescue!
translation.fr:
Je vous tiens ! Rassure-toi, Donnie !
C'est pas un câlin, c'est un sauvetage !

translation.en: Where are we? Staten Island?
translation.fr: Où on est ? À Staten Island ?

translation.en: Oh, gross.
So how would everyone rate that rescue experience? Unsatisfied?
translation.fr:
Comment notez-vous ce sauvetage ? "Nul", "Très nul",
"Moins bien que Donnie" ?

translation.en: Very unsatisfied? Wish Donnie would have done it? Um-hum?
-[grunts] -Donnie.
Leo's still up there.
Casey. Casey, come in.
Sensei, I'm here. And I've got eyes on the key.
translation.fr:
Sensei ? Je te reçois.
J'ai la clé devant moi.

translation.en: Tell me when you're home free, and I'll pull the plug.
Casey, listen to me. When I get to the other side, you close that door.
translation.fr:
Non, Casey.
Quand je passe la porte, tu fermes.

translation.en: What? Sensei, no!
[Leo] Casey, it's the only way. He's too strong. He's not gonna stay on the other side unless I keep him there.
translation.fr:
On n'arrivera pas à le battre.
Je dois rester pour l'empêcher de revenir.

translation.en: [Casey Jones] There has to be another way!
[Leo] We tried everything, Case. This is the only way.
translation.fr: On a tout tenté. C'est le seul moyen.

translation.en: Leo, please don't do this! Leo!
You're one to talk, big bro. Hero moves are totally your style.
translation.fr:
Tu peux parler,
toi qui adores jouer les héros.

translation.en: Outmatched and alone, yet you persist.
translation.fr:
Tu t'acharnes,
alors que tu es seul et moins bien armé.

translation.en: For what?
Honor, redemption?
Sacrifice? All meaningless.
We'll see about that.
[Casey Jones] Leo, please! I can't lose you again.
translation.fr: Leo, je refuse qu'on se sépare à nouveau.

translation.en: [Leo] Hey, future me would be real proud of you. I'm proud of you.
translation.fr:
Le futur moi serait très fier de toi.
Moi, je le suis.

translation.en: Weak words, weak actions.
translation.fr: Tu parles et tu agis comme un faible.

translation.en: I have forever known what you fail to understand,
translation.fr:
Je sais depuis toujours
ce que tu ne veux pas comprendre :

translation.en: strength always prevails!
translation.fr: les forts gagnent à tous les coups !

translation.en: What you fail to understand is I missed on purpose.
translation.fr:
Toi, tu n'as pas compris
que je t'ai raté exprès.

translation.en: No, enough of your little tricks.
Casey, close the portal now.
What?
No! Let go of me!
Casey, please.
You've been portal chopped.
You…
You've ruined everything!
And now… [chuckles] …my wrath will be reserved for you alone.
translation.fr:
À présent, je vais pouvoir déchaîner
toute ma fureur contre toi.

translation.en: You think you've won, you wretched little pest?
translation.fr:
Tu crois avoir gagné,
sale petite vermine ?

translation.en: Wipe that grin off your face!
Mikey, it's over.
Leo never gave up on us.
translation.fr: Il ne nous a jamais abandonnés.

translation.en: I'm not giving up on him.
Whoa. Mikey, whatever you're doing, don't stop!
translation.fr:
Mikey, tu fais quoi ?
Surtout, ne t'arrête pas !

translation.en: We're here, Mikey. Together.
[sighs] Took you guys long enough.
[Raph] Leo!
-Leo? -Hey.
Eww! Are we in Staten Island?
translation.fr: Berk ! On est à Staten Island ?

translation.en: -Come here! -Aww!
No pictures.
[Casey Jones] So this is "grabbing a slice"?
I don't get it.
Wait for it.
So much better than rats!
Hey, the rest of the world we saved is pretty great too.
translation.fr:
Ça valait le coup
de sauver le monde, hein ?

translation.en: All right, everybody, look up here.
April, you just got a message from someone named "Cassandra."
translation.fr:
April, un message
d'une certaine Cassandra.

translation.en: Looks like our friend Cassandra has been busy.
translation.fr: Notre amie Cassandra n'a pas chômé !

translation.en: That's my mom!
There goes the space-time continuum.
-[April laughs] -You did it, little brother. You really did it.
translation.fr: T'as réussi, petit frère. T'as assuré !

translation.en: I'm proud of you.
[gulps] This wasn't about me. It was about all of us doing what needed to be done
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas grâce à moi.
On a tous fait notre devoir.

translation.en: because we're heroes.
[laughs] You said "heroes."
There it is, gentlemen, our home.
What a town. Beautiful.
And if it needs defending, we'll always rise to the challenge.
translation.fr:
Et si elle est menacée,
on sera prêts à relever le défi.

translation.en: Speaking of which, you know what challenge I'm gonna rise to?
translation.fr:
À propos,
tu sais quel défi je vais relever ?

translation.en: -Beating that record! -Yay!
No way! No, okay, fine.
[Leo] All right, Big Raphie, let's do it!
[all chanting] Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph!
